title: [Large-Scale] Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Module for Developing Critical Thinking and Interpersonal Skills in Medical Professional Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary medical knowledge and understanding of mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Learners have experience with mathematical approaches to medical problem-solving and team-based collaboration but remain at an introductory level in advanced PBL design and critical thinking application

learning_goals: The learner designs and interprets mathematical models for medical case analysis with over 80% accuracy
The learner improves learning issues (LI) three or more times based on peer feedback in the PBL process and applies self-directed learning strategies
The learner demonstrates interpersonal competencies in resolving team conflicts and decision-making processes through role allocation and discussion analysis
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
